meanings.definition: A plant of the mint family with aromatic leaves.
meanings.sent1: The salvia in the garden smelled so nice.
meanings.sent2: I planted some salvia in my backyard for its fragrance.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the salvia plant.
meanings.sent4: Herbal teas are like a sip of salvia's essence.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant purple color of salvia brightened up the garden.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants including the sage.
meanings.sent1: The salvia genus has many different species.
meanings.sent2: Sage is part of the salvia genus.
meanings.sent3: The chef used salvia in the recipe for extra flavor.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the salvia plants danced in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The salvia genus is known for its medicinal properties.

meanings.definition: A preparation of the leaves of certain species of salvia, used as a hallucinogenic drug.
meanings.sent1: He experienced vivid dreams after consuming salvia.
meanings.sent2: Salvia is sometimes used for its hallucinogenic effects.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to think the salvia was catnip!
meanings.sent4: His mind soared like a bird after taking salvia.
meanings.sent5: The effects of salvia made reality seem like a dream.
